Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

---

Dear [Customer's Name],

I hope this message finds you well and enjoying delightful moments with us here at Delphi's Delights. I'm reaching out to you today with an important update regarding your rewards points. As your dedicated Loyalty Program Manager, it’s my pleasure to ensure you make the most of your well-earned rewards!

Currently, you have a total of 3,250 points waiting for a delicious treat. However, these points are set to expire in just 3 days! We wouldn't want you to miss out on a fantastic opportunity to indulge in some delightful moments, so I encourage you to act swiftly.

To make it easier for you, why not consider redeeming your points for some of our irresistible drinks? Indulge in the refreshing Persephone’s Pomegranate Tea or warm up with a mug of Dionysus' Divine Cocoa. Each of these delightful options can be yours for just 800 points.

Don't let your hard-earned rewards points go to waste! Simply click on the [Rewards Portal] to explore our full selection and make your choice while you still can.

Thank you for being a valued part of the Delphi's Delights family. I'm here to help you make the most out of every visit, so feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if there’s anything else you need.

Warm regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi's Delights

**Subject:** Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

Dear [Customer's Name],

However, there’s a bit of urgency to this message - your points are set to expire in just 3 days.

To ensure you don’t miss out on savoring those delightful treats and drinks, simply click on this link to access your [Rewards Portal]. Here, you’ll find a plethora of options to spend your points.

May we suggest treating yourself with:

- **Dionysus' Divine Cocoa**: Rich, creamy, and a luxury in every sip for only 800 points.

As the loyalty program manager, my number-one goal is to ensure you have the best experience possible with us. This is a gentle reminder to seize the chance to use your rewards before time runs out. 

Should you need any assistance or have questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We’re always here to help!

Warm regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi's Delights  

---

Enjoy your points and see you soon!
